channel.title: Glenns Ferry|Elmore County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Glenns Ferry|Elmore County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30
item.description: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left on I-84/US-30 west towards Boise and Mountain Home. Continue straight ahead for Old US-30 towards King Hill.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84
item.description: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 121). Turn right for I-84/US-30 East to Bliss and Twin Falls. Roadway continues as Old US-30 to King Hill.

item.title: Old Oregon Trail at BL-84 (1st St.)
item.description: East Old Oregon Trail Highway at BL-84 (1st St) in Glenns Ferry. Turn right to take 1st St. into Glenns Ferry. The 1st St. is part of the Main Oregon Trail Back Country Byway.

item.title: BL-84 West - Main Oregon Trail Back Country Byway
item.description: Turn right on to continue on the Oregon Trail Back Country Byway and BL-84 (Railroad Ave) in Glenns Ferry.

item.title: BL-84 West - Glenns Ferry
item.description: BL-84 west (1st St.) at Railroad Ave. in Glenns Ferry. Turn right on Railroad Ave. to continue on west BL-84.

item.title: BL-84 West - Glenns Ferry
item.description: Speed limit 25 MPH on BL-84 west in Glenns Ferry.

item.title: BL-84 West - Entering Glenns Ferry
item.description: Entering Glenns Ferry, Idaho on BL-84 west - Population 1,611.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84 East and BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84 East/BL-84 junction. Turn left on I-84 east towards Bliss and Twin Falls. Continue straight for BL-84 into Glenns Ferry.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry, 1 mile.

item.title: BL-84 - Glenns Ferry
item.description: Bannock St. north at Oregon Trail. Continue north on Bannock St. for BL-84 west (to I-84 west). Turn right on Oregon Trail for I-84 east (via BL-84 east).

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121 - BL-84/Glenns Ferry at the eastern end of the Glenns Ferry business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 121 - BL-84/Glenns Ferry at the eastern end of the Glenns Ferry business loop.
